description: The graph depicts the frequency of headlines mention in relevant Russian-language media. It uses regex expressions for requesting the words "pumping", “weapon” in the Tableau worksheet. Timeframe: 01.01.2022 - 31.07.2022. Data source: GDELT.
chart_title: Frequency of headlines mentioning the “pumping of weapons” marker.
name: cold_war_ii-tableau-armament_pump
